mapper.update: update process set process_name = #{processName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_start_date = #{processStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, process_end_date = #{processEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_type = #{processType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factory_equipment_id = #{factoryEquipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_status = #{processStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where process_id = #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select process_id, process_name, process_start_date, process_end_date, process_type, factory_equipment_id, process_status, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, product_id from process where process_id = #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select process_id, process_name, process_start_date, process_end_date, process_type, factory_equipment_id, process_status, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, product_id from process

SELECT C.product_type_name, sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute, A.process_start_date, process_end_date)/60) as total , AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute, A.process_start_date, process_end_date)/60) as average FROM paper_dt.process A, paper_dt.product B, paper_dt.product_type C WHERE A.product_id = B.product_id AND B.product_type_id = C.product_type_id AND A.process_start_date BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01')," " , "00:00:00") AND now() AND A.process_type = 'W' GROUP BY C.product_type_id

SELECT B.weight, sum(output.value) as result FROM paper_dt.process A, paper_dt.product B, paper_dt.product_type C, ( SELECT measure_date, value FROM paper_dt.raw_tag_data WHERE tag_id = 'PM3_OUTPUT_COUNT' AND measure_date BETWEEN #{tagFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{tagTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND value > 0 ) AS output WHERE output.measure_date BETWEEN process_start_date AND process_end_date AND A.product_id = B.product_id AND B.product_type_id = C.product_type_id AND C.product_type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY B.weight
